import { useContext } from "react"; import { ApiContext } from "../../context/ApiContext"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const JobsMenu = ()=>{ const { allJobs } = useContext(ApiContext); return (
{allJobs ? allJobs.map((job, i) => {return

{job.title}

{job.payment_method.split("'")[3] + job.payment_method.split("'")[1]}

{job.description.slice(0, 110) + "..."}

} ): null}

Job Title

Payment

Description

Job Title

Payment

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.

) } export default JobsMenu;
